name: ai-slop-detector-screenshots
description: Remotion screenshots for AI-SLOP Detector README

scripts.render:cli: npx remotion still Root CLIOutput out/cli-output.png
scripts.render:arch: npx remotion still Root ArchitectureDiagram out/architecture.png
scripts.render:detection: npx remotion still Root DetectionCategories out/detection-categories.png
scripts.render:score: npx remotion still Root QualityScore out/quality-score.png
scripts.render:all: npm run render:cli && npm run render:arch && npm run render:detection && npm run render:score
